Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes the commissioner of the department of civil service to reinstate Frank Pallett on the eligible civil service list for employment as a State University of New York police officer
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of the department of civil service to reinstate Frank Pallett on the eligible civil service list for employment as a State University of New York police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the commissioner of the department of civil service to reinstate Frank Pallett on the eligible civil service list for employment as a State University of New York police officer
